name: Friends (SShad0W)
description:
A short little visual novel (not too visual, wasn't able to draw anything), that was supposed to have the objective of being rejected. I couldn't write enough in time, and think I was a little too ambitious for only 3 days. Hope you like the little that this game have. I will continue to work on it, after the jam evaluation period, as I liked to work on it. Expect to have an awesome game as soon as I am able to finish it!

Play with the mouse!
